feature_model.name: Aircraft
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Aircraft (f_Aircraft) :m Materials (f_Materials) :m Wing (f_Wing) :o Engine (f_Engine) :g [1, 1] : Piston (f_Piston) : Jet (f_Jet) :g [1, *] : High (f_High) : Shoulder (f_Shoulder) : Low (f_Low) :g [1, *] : Plastic (f_Plastic) : Metal (f_Metal) : Wood (f_Wood) : Cloth (f_Cloth)
